comment: The easiest Econ class I've ever had in my life. Everything is open book. Probably the easiest class you'll ever have in your life. Offers extra credit to get extra points on your exams. Just 4 exams and five quizzes for this class.
Easy online summer class finished as early as the end of June. Textbook is not needed. No lockdown browser.
This class is very easy and straightforward. The lecture videos can be long. The study guides are just like what is on the quizzes. 10 week class. Gives multiple extra credit opportunities.
Professor is super good! Lays out clear expectations and gives you sooo many resources to exceed those expectations!!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: This online econ class is super easy but the lecture videos can tend to be long. The study guides and quizzes are exactly like the tests. I found the book online but you don't really need it. If you take this class online you'll be done by the 10th week. I RECOMMEND THIS PROFESSOR. EASY A

Honestly was scared to take Econ, it was a requirement but this class was relatively easy. He gives our extra credit opportunities for every single exams, as well as study guides and exam practices before taking the actual exam which was super helpful. Great class.
His class was pretty easy as long as you keep up with your notes the tests and quizzes should be simple. Gives extra credit for every test.
His online econ class is super easy. The study guides are exactly like the tests. I didnt really use the textbook, just used his lecture notes and passed with an A.
